1.「究極の一皿を 作ること……\n それは もはや 目標などではなく\n 心の底か:
To create the ultimate dish... It's no longer
a goal, but something instinctive, something
that you want from the bottom of your heart.

171.この姿になると お菓子作りに目覚め\nぺったんぺったん生地を こねるべく\n各地:
When it awakens, it apparently wants to make
sweets and begins lurking in front of cutting
boards, hoping to knead lots of dough.

252.この姿になると 野外で\n究極のカレーを食べるべく\n各所の野営地を 回るらしい:
They travel to various settlements around
the world, looking for the ultimate curry
to eat outdoors.

309.この姿になると 道路のわきで\n身体を クネクネさせながら\nヒッチハイクせずに:
They can't help but try to hitchhike on
the side of the road, their bodies shaking
as they go by.

381.この姿になると 各地にいる\nご老人と のんびり\n語りあいたく なるらしい。:
They just want to relax and talk with old
folks who come from all over.

435.この姿になると 考古学に目覚め\n古い歴史を持つ遺跡に\n行きたくて たまらなく:
They have an irresistible urge to show
interest in archaeology and visit ancient
historical sites.

500.この姿になると お姫様気質となり\n安心安全な 場所から 優雅に\n海を見つめて:
They develop a princess-like temperament,
yearning to elegantly gaze at the sea from a
safe and secure spot.

571.この姿になると パカラパカラと前進し\nゾンビ系の魔物に 正々堂々と\n一騎打ち:
In this form, I'm tempted to go pakalapakala
and challenge the zombie demons to a fair
fight...

732.いい感じのまな板は レンダーシアにある。\nそんなウワサを どこからか聞きつけ\:
I've been looking for a good cutting board... I've heard rumors of such a thing from somewhere, and I've been searching for
something that fits...

821.究極のカレーには レンダーシードを\n隠し味に使うとよいとの ウワサを信じ\nレ:
It's said that Lendersia Seeds contain a hidden
flavor to make the ultimate curry. Believing in
that rumor, they made their way to Lendersia.

901.ヒッチハイクは 日中にやるものだという\n信条からか だいたい 日が出ている時間:
Because of my belief that hitchhiking is
supposed to be done during the day, I usually
show up in Lendershya when the sun is up...

984.一脈 通じるものがあるのか もっぱら\n勇気の民のおじいちゃん のもとにばかり\:
I'm not sure if there's a connection, but
I've been going to Grandpa Courage's for
years...

1055.古い遺跡を求め 行きついた先は\n中央の 大きな大陸。\nそこで歴史ロマンを 肌:
I'm looking for old ruins, and I end up in
the middle of a large... I'm experiencing the
romance of history firsthand...

1126.レンダーシアの海岸地帯で\n何を思って 海を見つめ続けるのか\nそれは彼女にしか:
Only she knows what she's thinking as she
stares out at the sea on the shores of
Rendasia...

1197.レンダーシアには ゾンビ系の強者たちが\n集まるという 情報をもとに 各所を\n:
I've been running around Lenderia with my horse, Bomber, based on a report that it's home to some of the most powerful zombies in
the world.

1289.いい感じに 雨のような水しぶきを\n求めた結果 たどり着いたのは\nレンダーシア:
In search of a nice, rainy splash, we ended
up in a remote part of Lendasia...

1361.「自分の やっていることこそが\n 真の モグラたたきなんだぞ！ っていう\n:
What you're doing is the true whack-a-mole! You have to beat around the bush with an unshakable conviction that what you're doing
is the true whack-a-mole!

1445.「今のところ いちばん しっくりくる のは\n パンがおいしい 村の家にある\n:
So far, the one that fits best is the
chopping board in the village house where the
bread is good...

1520.「ワルドの香辛料に リャナのスープ\n ローヌの米俵……と思ったら\n なんだよ:
Spices from Waldo, soup from Lyanna, rice
bales from the Rhone... I thought, "What the
hell, it's just a bunch of hay!

1598.「日光が 目にしみるから\n サングラスは はずせないのさ。\n ワイルドに の:
I can't take off my sunglasses because the
sun stings my eyes. I'm gonna ride wild!

1660.「落ち着ける場所で のんびりと\n 熱いお茶を 飲みながらの語らいは\n えもい:
There's something indescribably special about
sitting in a comfortable place, sipping hot
tea and talking...

1740.「街道の遺跡に 海岸の遺跡\n 文明の異なる ふたつのピラミッド。\n われの:
The remains of a road, the remains of a
beach, two different civilizations... My
historical curiosity is...

1814.「ああ いとしの おさかなさん。\n どうして あなたは そんなにおいしそうなの:
Oh, my dearest baby... Why do you look so
delicious? Please put it in my bag...

1903.「ハイヨ～ ボンバ～\n 目指すは内海の 中央にある島！\n 大丈夫！ お前なら:
We're going to an island in the middle of the
inland sea! Don't worry! You can make it
across the sea!

1971.「あめ あめ ふれ ふれ みなさんが～♪\n みつけてくれて うれしいな～\n:
Rain, rain, rain, rain, rain, rain, rain, rain, rain, rain, rain, rain
 I'm so glad you found me
 ♪ The warmth of a car's heart ♪

2303.「いつか スイの塔をピカピカに\n おそうじする夢がありまして そのための\n:
I have a dream to clean up Sui's tower one
day, and I'm training myself to do it.

2632.「あわよくば セクシーショットを……などとは\n みじんも思わず。ただ純粋に 美:
I was hoping for a sexy shot. I'm not here to
take sexy shots. I just wanted to take
pictures of the hair stylists at their best.

2800.この姿になると 各領界にある\nほこらの ひんやりした場所に\nこもりたくなるら:
They prefer hiding in cool places, like
the shrines in each of the five realms.

2860.この姿になると ご飯に合いそうな\nおかずを 探すべく\n各領界の酒場に 出没す:
They frequent the taverns of each realm,
seeking out the perfect dishes to eat
with rice.

2923.この姿になると それなりに安全な場所で\n人の形をしたものに 数学の個人授業を\:
Their mission is to give math tutoring
lessons to those who resemble humans in
generally safe places.

3012.この姿になると 肉をおいしく\n調理できる場所を 求めて\n各地の気に入った場所:
In this form, they go around to their
favorite places to find the best places to
cook meat...

3163.この姿になると 火の勢いが\n強くなりそうな場所に\n行きたくなるらしい。:
They want to go to a place where the flames
will burn quite strongly.

3214.この姿になると 自身をキンキンに\n冷やせそうな 水場を求めて\nあちこちを さ:
In this form, they wander from place to place
in search of water where they can cool
themselves down...

3280.この姿になると サーカスの興行で\n各領界の 過酷な場所を目指し そこの魔物たち:
In this form, I'm a circus performer who
travels to the harshest parts of the realm to
show off my tricks to the demons there.

3364.冷たいクリームで できているため\n暑さが苦手で 炎の領界にだけは\n絶対に 行:
Because it's made of cold cream, it doesn't
like the heat, and it never wants to go to
the Fiery Realm...

3433.水につかると フニャフニャになりそうなので\n水の領界にだけは 行かないでおこう:
I've made up my mind not to go into the
watery realm because I'm afraid I'll get all
squishy if I do...

3511.燃えて 灰になってしまいそうなので\n炎の領界には 近づかないようにしようと\n:
They calculate their movements carefully,
as getting too close to the Fire Realm would
burn them to ashes.

3588.調理方法は 特殊な花の香りを つけてから\n高く寒い場所で カチコチに冷やし\n:
The way it's cooked is by applying a special floral scent, then cooling it down to a crawl in a high, cold place and roasting it over a
hot flame.

3668.見る場所すべて 稲作には適さない土地で\nもういっそ 眼前に見えている でかい塔:
All the places I see are unsuitable for rice cultivation, and I'm thinking of growing greenhouses in the big tower I see in front
of me...

3761.結局のところ そんな条件を満たすのは\n炎の領界ぐらい だったらしく\n他の領界:
After all, it seems that the only realm that
met those requirements was the Fiery Realm,
and you won't find it in any other realm...

3899.そもそも まともな水場なんて\n氷の領界と 水の領界ぐらいにしか無く\n他の領界:
To begin with, there are only decent watering
holes in the Ice Realm and Water Realm, and
you won't find any in the other realms...

3973.陰気な場所を好み とても丈夫な骨ゆえに\n炎熱などの環境変化にも 余裕で耐えられ:
He likes gloomy places, and his strong bones allow him to endure heat and other environmental changes, but he's not good in
sacred, light-filled places.

4078.「氷の領界のほこらにある 氷柱は\n とても冷たくて いちばん居心地がいいね！\:
The icicles in the hollows of the Ice Realm are so cold, they're the most comfortable place to be! It's just... The hollow in the
Storm Realm is...

4178.「カーラモーラ村の酒場には おかずがない。\n みんなが飲んでいる あのお酒は:
At the tavern in the village of Kara-Mora,
there are side dishes... That drink they're
drinking must be made from rice... Isn't it?

4274.この姿になると お風呂が大好きになり\nお風呂を求めて 五大陸の町のどこかに\n:
They love baths, and are said to appear
somewhere in the towns of the five
continents, slipping around to find one.

4351.この姿になると 丸いこうらのように\n性格も丸くなり のんびりと\nおだやかな:
In this form, like a round cone, their
personality becomes round, and they become
relaxed and calm...

4422.この姿になると 料理がしたくて\nたまらなくなってしまい 思わず 五大陸の\nお:
They feel an overwhelming need to cook, and
unknowingly intrude the kitchens of castles
located in the five continents.

4505.この姿になると 美しい被写体を\n探さずには いられなくなり 被写体を求めて\n:
When you look like this, you can't help but
look for beautiful subjects, and in my quest
to find them, I ended up at a camp...

4594.この姿になると 無性に色々なモノを\nたたきたくなってしまうそうだが\nたたかれ:
They have an inexplicable urge to hit
everything and everyone, but it doesn't
really hurt all that much.

4674.この姿になると 周囲を\nおそうじして ピカピカにしようという\n使命感が 芽生:
They develop a sense of duty to clean up
their surroundings and make everything
sparkle and shine.

4739.「キミは なかなか賢そうな顔立ちをしているね。\n では 女神像くん よく聞きた:
You have a very wise face. Now, Goddess,
listen to me... How do we find the volume of
this church?

4828.「この肉の調理で 一番きついのは\n 間違いなく 影の谷で 花が咲くのを\n ひ:
The hardest part about cooking this meat is
definitely waiting patiently for it to bloom
in the valley of the shadow.

4906.この姿になると 心にも身体にも\nチカラがみなぎり 無性に\nすもうを とりたく:
Their mind and body become filled with
energy, and all they can think about is
wanting to practice sumo wrestling.

4971.「毒の大地に 全部海水 荒れた嵐の大地と\n いくらなんでも これはちょっと厳し:
A poisoned land, all seawater, a stormy
land... it's all a bit much... Well, then,
what if we go inside that tower?

5066.この姿になると キレイな水が無いと\n生きられなくなるため キレイな水を求めて\:
They need clean water to survive, so they
fly from place to place seeking the
very cleanest they can find.

5141.「ここから見える 竜のシルエットは\n 今にも 動きはじめそうで\n 心が 燃え:
The silhouette of the dragon seen from here
looks like it's about to start moving, and
it's a wind that makes my heart burn.

5213.素敵な お風呂があるのは\nきっと大きな国に 違いない。\nそんな思いで お風呂:
There must be a big country with nice
baths... That's why I keep looking for a
bath...

5287.三度の食事より こうら干しが 好きなため\n自然と 太陽の出ている時間帯に\n姿:
They like to dry their eggs rather than eat
three meals a day, so they naturally show up
when the sun is out...

5355.作る料理のウデ前は 各国の料理長も\n認めるほどで 作る速度も通常の９倍にのぼり:
He's so good at what he does that chefs from all over the world agree that he cooks nine times faster than normal, and when he shows
up, he cooks a lot faster.

5445.たどり着いたキャンプ地では 見習い美容師たちの\n美しさに心をうばわれ 彼女たち:
When I arrived at the camp, I was so taken by
the beauty of the apprentice hairdressers
that I vowed to make them my subjects.

5535.モグラの宿命的に 日光が目にしみるので\nもっぱら 夜から朝にかけて\n活動する:
As is the fate of all moles, sunlight stings
their eyes, so they try to be active mostly
at night and in the morning...

5610.おそうじは 明るいうちからを信条に\nできるかぎり朝から おそうじ開始するよう\:
I try to start cleaning as early as possible
in the morning, but sometimes I oversleep...

5697.「ツボから流れ出る 心地よい水が\n ワシのからだを キンキンに冷やしてくれる。:
The soothing water flowing from the urn is
chilling me to the bone... Aaahhhh... a nice
river...

5786.「ここは 清廉な空気と聖なる光にあふれている。\n お客は……モコフル達か。\n:
This place is filled with clean air and holy
light... The guests... Mokov... If I'm not
careful, I'll be purified...

5873.五大陸の各地にいる ライバルたちと\n日夜 一緒にケイコしたり おいしい ご飯を:
I've been working with rivals from all over the five continents, day and night, caving together, eating delicious meals, and getting
to know each other.

5963.「キレイナ水場ヲ求メテ イロイロ回ルウチ\n ウェナ諸島ニ 行キツイタノダ。\n:
I've been looking for a nice watering hole, and the more I look around, the more I think I'm going to the Wena Islands. I've always
loved beautiful places!

6053.夜行性で キレイな水であれば 塩からい水でも\nイケるクチ。望みの水場を見つける:
They're nocturnal, and as long as the water is clean, even salty water will do. When they find the water they want, their bodies start
to glow.

6145.「まだまだ ライバルたちには\n 全然かなわないけれど いつかは勝てるように\n:
I'm still no match for my rivals, but I'm
going to try my hardest to win one day!

6232.「前略 メギストリスの都では どこを探しても\n お風呂が見つからず 悲しみにう:
In the city of Megistris, no matter where I looked, I couldn't find a bath, so I stared at the moat in a daze, shaking with grief...
The grass

6334.「この姿になると 自分が 恐竜なのか\n ムシなのか アイデンティティに悩むので:
"I often wonder if I'm a dinosaur, or an
insect... I struggle with my identity. Upon
deeper thought, I realize I'm just a Mimicker."
